Name: Lake
Description: Don't swim in that lake. Don't even go within twenty feet of it.

Name: Mushroom
Description: Like the trees here it is lavishly colorful but it is toxic to injest or even touch. Leave it alone.

Name: Sleeping Lutin
Description: You notice it and immediately back away. The only reason you are alive right now and not in its stomach is the fact that it is sleeping.
